content:
WE discussed the notion of a default list on the Call today and need to follow up offline to flesh out what we mean and whether we want it in scope for the project.

A default lists is part of discovery of list of lists?

This is different from What list am I allowed to see. It is which list you should start with.

e.g., when you sign in and run a provider app, you might want to have a list visible right away, without having to choose anything. Just "the default list" for the user, given the launch context.

Questions

  • is it property of user or list?
  • display on user start?
  • How does app know what the system default is?

TODO: decide which, if any of these requirements to support

  • [ ] User sets default within app (app-specific default)
  • [ ] Does this get propagated to the EHR?
  • [ ] User set default within the EHR, and apps learns
  • [ ] Source set default within the EHR, and apps learns
  • [ ] Default lists are out of scope

Just a reminder, Argo PL Call this Wednesday.

Agenda:

  1. Decide on Default lists - see the above post
  2. @Carl Anderson to present some supplemental developer materials (introductory how-to guides) for the Patient Lists argonaut project to help drive more detailed discussion.
  3. API design proposals
